result.longName: Shenzhen King Explorer Science and Technology Corporation

assetProfile.address2: 33rd Floor, High-tech Zone, No. 63 Gaoxin South 10th Road, Yuehai Street Binhai Community, Nanshan District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Shenzhen King Explorer Science and Technology Corporation researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells intelligent equipment systems to civil explosive production and blasting service companies in China and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Civil explosive integration, fine chemicals, intelligent manufacturing, and King Aobo smart cloud. The company's products include industrial explosives products, mobile and fixed industrial explosives production ground stations, on-site mixed industrial explosives open-air mixed trucks, on-site mixed industrial explosives underground charging vehicles and underground charging devices, Substrate transport vehicle, remote substrate grading and distribution system, robot intelligent packaging production line, crawler loading and unloading robot system, industrial detonator automatic assembly production line. In addition, it offers industrial robots; industrial internet smart civil explosion information management software, special emulsifier, integrated composite oil phase and industrial explosives and industrial detonators series civil explosive equipment, etc; and King Aobo technology used in intelligent equipment, software and information technology empower civil explosives, military industry, food, packaging, tobacco and chemical industries, as well as provides comprehensive solutions to the construction of digital workshops, clean factories, and smart factories of industrial enterprises, as well as technical consulting services. Shenzhen King Explorer Science and Technology Corporation was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
